name: vaadin-grid-selection-column

properties.name: resizable
properties.description: When set to true, the column is user-resizable.

properties.name: frozen
properties.description:
When true, the column is frozen. When a column inside of a column group is frozen,
all of the sibling columns inside the group will get frozen also.

properties.name: hidden
properties.description: When set to true, the cells for this column are hidden.

properties.name: width
properties.description: Width of the cells for this column.

properties.name: flexGrow
properties.description: Flex grow ratio for the cell widths. When set to 0, cell width is fixed.

properties.name: selectAll
properties.description: When true it selects all the items.

properties.name: autoSelect
properties.description: When true it adds the active item to selectedItems.

description:
`vaadin-grid-selection-column` is a helper element for the `vaadin-grid` that provides default templates and functionality for the selection.
With it the user can select rows using checkboxes displayed in a column.

When the grid is configured with an array of items as the data provider, it provides the feature of selecting all the items by clicking on the checkbox in the header.
